name: Dekimasen
description:
Dekimasen (できません), translated in english as "you cannot".

With your katana, you must survive your nightmare against hordes of doppelganger attacking you from everywhere.
Every 6 seconds one of your 3 commands will stop working, so you must choose your moves wisely or your end will come too fast.

Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2020, themed "Out of Control".

Team members:

Programming: Hondrus / MisterM

Graphics: Victroium

Music and SFX: Hondrus
